text: Djimon Gaston Hounsou (born April 24, 1964) is a Beninese-American actor and model. As an actor, Hounsou has been nominated for two Academy Awards.Djimon Hounsou: The Push Interview Kam Williams. KamWilliams.com. 2009-01-30 In 1987, he became a model and started a career in Paris. He moved to the United States in 1990.Djimon Hounsou Biography In the Marvel Cinematic Universe he plays the role of Korath the Pursuer in Guardians of the Galaxy (2014) and in Captain Marvel (2019). Also, in the DC Extended Universe, he played the role of the Fisherman King in Aquaman (2018), and the wizard Shazam in Shazam! (2019). ==Filmography== List of movie and television credits Year Title Role Notes 1990 Beverly Hills, 90210 Doorman 1990 Without You I’m Nothing Ex-boyfriend 1992 Unlawful Entry Prisoner on bench 1994 Stargate Horus Guard 1997 The Small Hours 1997 Amistad Cinque NAACP Image Award for Outstanding Actor in a Motion Picture Nominated -
